name: Doors: Origins
description:
Earth as we know it is now on a path of destruction. A sky of constantly shifting colors, floods in places where the rain never stops, and when the snow falls it is gray. All seemed lost until we discovered a mysterious portal.

INTUITIVE AR MODE
Take this puzzle-solving adventure out of your device and put it into the real world.

BEAUTIFUL 3D GRAPHICS
Our artists created hundreds of 3D concepts and only the most spectacular puzzle doors made it into the game. It's true.

ENGAGING PUZZLES
We challenged ourselves like never before while making this game. Get ready for some epic puzzles and unforgettable surprises.

ABSORBING AUDIO
Best enjoyed with sound! Custom soundtrack and specially selected ambient sounds will complement each other for an immersive experience.

TRY FOR FREE
Play for free with the option to purchase additional levels and experience the whole story that will leave you impressed.

DESIGNED WITH THE IPHONE AND IPAD IN MIND
The game fits beautifully on all iOS screens and makes great use of AR and Haptic technologies.

An outstanding 3D puzzle escape game that you don't want to miss!
